borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <div>The proposed outbuilding by reason of excessive height is considered harmful to the appearance of the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</div><div>- Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);</div><div>-&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 11pt;">Policies&nbsp;SP 2, DMD 1 and DMD 6&nbsp;of the Draft Local Plan&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">(Regulation 19 Consultation&nbsp;Version, October 2020);</span></div><div>- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);</div><div>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</div><div>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).</div>

<div style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);">The proposed outbuilding by reason of excessive height would result in an increased sense of overbearingness and a harmful loss of daylight to neighbouring occupiers, therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:<br></div><div style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><br></div><div style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);">- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</div><div style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);">- Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);</div><div style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);">-&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 11pt;">Policies DMD 1 and DMD 6&nbsp;of the Draft Local Plan&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">(Regulation 19 Consultation&nbsp;Version, October 2020);</span></div><div style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);">- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);</div><div style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);">- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</div><div style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);">- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).</div>
description: Construction of a single storey outbuilding in the rear garden for ancillary purposes.
